title: A terrible battell betweene the two consumers of the whole world: time, and death. By Samuell Rowlands
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: [By W. Jaggard] for Iohn Deane, and are to be sold at his shop..,
notes: Running title reads: A bloudy battell betweene time and death.
